newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Reditus to meet possible buyer of stake.
newsitem.headline: Reditus to meet possible buyer of stake.

text.p: Portuguese computer company Reditus has set a meeting with offshore company Greenville Securities Ltd for March 3 at which Greenville will discuss the possibility of taking a stake in Reditus, a statement said.
"Reditus received a fax from Greenville Securities Ltd's lawyer in Portugal, advising of Greenville's interest in the possibility of taking a stake in Reditus," it said.
The Financial Markets Committee (CMVM) suspended trade in Reditus shares today after a press report said Greenville planned to take a stake of more than 25 percent in the company.
Reditus last traded on Lisbon bourse at 550 escudos on Wednesday.
